competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: Bundled with Microsoft 365, dominant in enterprise

competitors.name: Apple iCloud
competitors.notes: Consumer cloud storage for Apple users

context: In 2020, Dropbox faced intense competition from bundled cloud storage from Microsoft, Google, and Apple. The pandemic boosted remote work and file collaboration needs. Dropbox pivoted toward collaborative workspace with acquisition of DocSend and HelloSign integration. Competition from free bundled storage pressured the standalone file sync market.
